original_text: You shall have olive trees throughout all your territory, but you shall not anoint yourself with the oil, for your olives shall drop off.
korean_text: 네 모든 경내에 감람나무가 있을지라도 그 열매가 떨어지므로 그 기름을 네 몸에 바르지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: You shall have olive trees throughout all your territory
sentences.korean_translation: 네 땅 모든 곳에 올리브 나무가 있을 것이나

sentences.original_text: but you shall not anoint yourself with the oil
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 기름으로 몸에 바르지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: for your olives shall drop off.
